bug.author: alelasantillan
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'streamlite' is shown in browser <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13545134/73885767-5b92c280-4836-11ea-8243-fcffd77a64df.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
created virtualenv with pyenv in python 3.6.5, and activate it pip install streamlit: installed ok streamlit run simple_example.py (simple_example contains just one line: import streamlite as st) opens the browser at http://localhost:8501/ but showing a red box like this
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Void webpage <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
A red box is shown, with the following text: Traceback: File "/Users/alejandrosantillaniturres/Desktop/programming/python/streamlit/lib/python3.6/site-packages/streamlit/ScriptRunner.py", line 314, in _run_script exec(code, module.dict) File "/Users/alejandrosantillaniturres/Desktop/programming/python/streamlit/simple_example.py", line 1, in import streamlite as st <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
no <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: (get it with $ streamlit version) Streamlit, version 0.55.0 Python version: (get it with $ python --version) Python 3.6.5 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? PyEnv OS version: Mac OS 10.15.1 Browser version: Chrome Version 79.0.3945.117 (Official Build) (64-bit)
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
I try to follow the first minute of the tutorial: <denchmark-link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B2iAodr0fOo>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B2iAodr0fOo</denchmark-link>
How to use Streamlit to create beautiful ML tools streamlit hello Works perfect!

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alelasantillan>@alelasantillan</denchmark-link> , this looks like just a typo in the script. An extra "e" that made it on the end of "streamlit":
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'streamlite' is shown in browser
If this is one of our example scripts we posted somewhere, can you point me to the script so we can fix it? Let me know if this helps!

Hi @alelasantillan , this looks like just a typo in the script. An extra "e" that made it on the end of "streamlit":
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'streamlite' is shown in browser
If this is one of our example scripts we posted somewhere, can you point me to the script so we can fix it? Let me know if this helps!
Ha ha, it fully helps! My fault. The bug is inside me!!!
